articles.title: Phillies vs. Rangers: Alec Bohm's defense costs Phils again - NBC Sports
articles.description: Alec Bohm continues to hit, but on Tuesday his defense again cost the Phillies dearly in a 6-4 loss to the visiting Texas Rangers. By Corey Seidman
articles.content:
Alec Bohm continues to hit, but on Tuesday his defense cost the Phillies dearly in a 6-4 loss to the visiting Texas Rangers.
